Title: Sic Transit Imperium
Writer: Brian Koppelman (created by), David Levien (created by), Andrew Ross Sorkin (created by), Wes Jones
Actors: Paul Giamatti, Damian Lewis, Maggie Siff, Malin Akerman
Plot: Axe is offered inside information from a former employee and considers whether to use it. Chuck faces external pressure to drop an ongoing investigation. Lara plans a lavish birthday ...
